Yea, way too much to say, so i wont say anything. Cant stay at my dads uinless he gos to court and gets something leagal that says hes my dad. he refuses to do that, and take responsibility. So i have to go wiht my mom whereever she goes. And sally. I dont even want to think about that. I really don't. I just want to sleep. I want to get stoned. I want to be someplace with people i know where i feel safe, and loved. Not here,but not anywhere else imight have to stay. I dont want to leave this awful place anymore.I want to stay,i dont care, i just dont want things ot be so bad. I was selfish, i thought only about myself, not sally, not my mom, not anyone. Just me. I just wanted freedom, no rules. A dumb idiot who couldnt stop me.  A room, which i would put locks on either side of the door tostop anyone form entering when im not in it, or when i am. Enough money every week... to buy what? More freedom? Fun? Yea. Everything i wanted. But thats never gonnahappen, im self destructive and the worlds out to get me, and no one gives. But one day soon i wil prevail, i will keep things moving forward, trying new things, never giving up, never getting scared off. Nothing can stop me now :/
Im listening to MM Holy wood. I love it, doesnt make me think of anyguys, any family, any friends, any pain, any memories. Good or bad, both are evil, both hurt you, the good ones are worst because theymkae oyu long for the real thing.
Monday, im leaving at lunch and getting stoned, i need to... hopefully i'll find someone to join me. Now i will sleep, badly, and wake early for anew awful day. Good night folks.

Cuz thats what i wanna do tommorrow, buy or get free drugs and do them. Pot though, anything else... it would have to seriosuly be the right situation with the right people.

<strike>INCREMENTS
some people don't know what they want out of life so they fall in love instead with vultures and hyenas who'll only love them when they're dead just when you think your safe one falls on your head you can die all of a sudden or you can do it in increments instead a promise is a lie in a time-release pill the things you say you will never do you eventually will and the vultures and hyenas must be patient and be still for lovers don't leap off of cliffs they just slowly go downhill</strike>

Now, ive got way too much time to think, about everything, and remeber everything, and feel everything. And the mor ei feel the worse it gets and the worse it gets the sicker i get. I feel sick to my stomach. And i want to die. And i cant eat anything. And i can'tget to sleep. And i dont know what to do. And all i want is you. Fuck that rhymed dear trent save me. Ok,in my angsty teenage drama confusion,i wrote a little poem. Its bad. Kill me. Youodnt need ot read it. But i feel like posting it anyways. Play with me You know oyu want to break your own will you think its wrong I think i'm wrong but its alright the truth is all it is I knew i was missing something Then you showedme your game And i wanted to play I went form nothing to everything just in your arms your mind is a lie that you tell yourself now im going ot make myself into one you'd like If im higher, you might get dizzy looking up so far, and give oyuself to the one who needs my addiction is your flesh when i win your in me you say its just a game But you're too good at it You want to win get me closer need me closer humanity pushes me away but i want to play again another day todayis another day ;ets play today i'll go by your rules just make your moves innocence lost is just a joke let me give it to you. Haha, dontlaugh.

I just feel so lost. And angry. And depressed. I can't believe anything could have that strong an effect on me.  I sorta brokedown last night...overeacted, got pissy, just complelty frustrated. I know he's a tease, i knew that from theminute i met him. I didnt care... he was just cool, a friend, yea i  liked him, but i never thought i would end up liking him this much. Its fucking sick. And not in my normal way, no, its notlike i just stalk him or osmething.  Eh, i dont care, i just dont wanna fuck upour friendship. Or act stupid. Cuz if i did that, it would be worse. I just can't forget feelinghappy. No one makes me happy. Why does he have to? Bad luck, i guess. :/
Today, i woke up sick. Felt like i was gonna puke. Almost started crying. Every few mintues another wave would hit me... and i would feel worse. Slowed down by history. Paul... Natasha... i laughed so hard... laughing at peoples awful luck made me less unhappy...
Randomly started hitting tihngs, breaking things throughout firt half of day... i think i hav osme anger issues. Left atlunch. With alanna, rita, anjelica. To go to this kid whos a friend of nicos house...i only rmeber nico cuz ivemet him before. One blunt, thats it for like six of us... ha. Good shit though, felt it fast, and at first i really felt an actual high feeling, before the drowsy/outofit/tired feeling i normally get. It shoudlnt be called a high, it should be called a low, cuz thats how it feels. But not in a bad way.
Discussed with some friends... now have people to get free&buy drugs from, not involving hell. anything i want. allunder 20$. so i can afford it. so i dont need him for drugs anymore.not that i wont want to get high w/ him still.
After leaving that guys house, went to arlins. Lara and logan were there. Arlins fucking apartment,,, bigger than any ive ever lived in. I think logan was fucking around with a guitar when i came in, but we moved into arlins room pretty fast after that. Logan likes Lara... if i wernt so preocupied with my own issues, i would be jealous.
fuck i have no more time thats all for tonight.

I dont want to hang out wiht my mom tommorrow. I want to go to school. Fuck. This sucks. I hate this. But im happy anyway. Heres a list of all the good things about moving.
Why i am really fucking happy to be moving to my dads:
- I have more freedom
- Hes dumber and will believe my lies
- I will get to keep my allowence
- I will get dsl andso now i can download music and go online more
- He has cable (Ifc, sundance, mtv2, vh1 classics... i miss cable)
- There is a working oven in his apt. I do not currently have that. 
- My ownroom wiht a door, i think there is a lock on it, and i could put another one on it anyways.
- I wont have to deal with my mom anymore
- I can invite people to my house, when my dads at work, its just an apt, but its something. 
- There are stores open past midnight...no stores are open in ridgewood past midnight that you could walk to.
- If i want to, my dad can drive me to school instead of subway.
- I'll be like... 40 blocks/3 train stops away from parkslope, so  I can han gout wiht Lara if i want to easier, and actually talk to kids form there again... wait, why would i want to do that... i truely dont know, but still, its an option.
- All of the teachers and school records have my moms adress/number on them, so if i do get in trouble they cant call home or send letters. Ha.
- He doesnt hate my friends or resent the fact that i have them, so he will let me actually go into the city on weekends and stay afterschool and live a real life, fuck that rocks.

There are only two bad things aobut my dads place 1) I have ot wake up ealier(no big deal, i wake uplike 2 hrs b/f my alarm clock goes off anyways) 2)I might have to take the train with sara some days, she likes like 4 or 5 blocks form ym dads house.

Ok, Since this whole day is suposed to be on the DL, i can only sorta outline the day. It involved many bottles of stolen alchohol, white frosting, pez (fun!), alanna's brothers pot, and rosavelt island. And i cut myself trying to opent he frosting with a straightedge, ow. Bassiccly alot of fun. My mom pushed the date we move back tot he end of febuary, because she doesnt have any idea of where we can stay, but she may move it up again to january if she cant pay rent this month. I can stay at my dads, but my mom is "dead to him" and should "stop askign him to do shit for her since he hates her and she is not his responsibility, i am" (im glad he got that clear in his head though) so she cannot stay there. If i go, i have my room (which is usually empty, or filled with storage... its even painted, from a year or so ago when i stayed there for a month or two...). I have all of my shit off my walls, most of it was taken down a couple of months ago when my mom pulled a major freak out "you have to leave", so all that was left was an add for thursdya, a sum41 mag cover, and the insert from the Harold and Maude dvd. I just want to go or stay, or go someplace new. All my life everything has been back and forth, we have to do something right now or give it a few days. Its never planned, never orderly. And everything that happens push the envelope alittle bit, but never go over the edge. Its awful. Thats why I am constantly afriad, as well as my dad, as well as the guy across the street, as well as my moms friends steff. In her own words she "causes that kind of reaction when she gets to know people." because they are always afraid, and are fucking nervous/paranoid/stressed because of her, and she always makes them believe this is the time i actually will do it, i will ruin everything I just wish the threats would stop, that i would safly be able to say "I will be living here for the next week, and i can plan on going to school in two days, and I will be able to take a shower and read some of my book later tonight". Nothing i say, plan, do, is ever acomplished on a scheduale. What i want to do is not importent, what the school says is not importent, what my dad says is not importent. She has the final say, she can do anything the fuck she wants. I wish i could live with my dad, and hang out after school for a few ehours at least thre times a week, i wish i could go into the city bymyself, or go han gout wiht firends on weekends, i wish i could use the computer when i need to, or have a few extraminutes to finish something importent to me. I wish i could keep my allowence, and nothave to go to the supermarket and the deli twice or three times a day to get my mom ciggarettes "I only smoke one and a half packs a day" Where do the other two go? "Those are for tommorrow" but you made me go and get anothe rpack when i woke up thismorning, at nine, and you will tommorrow "I dont smoke that much, only when im stressed" Yea, well ive been stressed my whole life. I dont need ciggarettes. I need to actually focus in school... i havent done homewokr in god knows how long, and i dont even know if there has been any. School work... dont finish that. And i go to class mostly, i only cut lit on tuesday. And im not cutting anymore, at least for a week or two until i know whats going on. I dont have anywhere to go if i cut anyway, i only go wiht lara to sephora (urban is out cuz she got caught), since i havent hung out with hell in a while, i doubt i'll go wiht him to coreys house or to b&n or anything...he deosnt show at my school anymore, or if he does i dont see him, probly cuz he doesnt want me to. I never ge tot go online till 11, or read, or write in my journal, or do any kind of work, orlisten to music until then. When i try im baggered into sitting doing nothing angry. Some one called me at like 1 30 am last night. The number was blocked, so i dont knw who it was. It wasporbly a wrong number... i was asleep so i didnt hear it. People who call me should leave messages, i do check them, and if i dont recognixze a nuber or its blcoked i usally wont pick it up cuz i dont trsut people (coughcoughxianand chloe in 7th gradecough) with my numbers.
